name: ENTREPRENEURS ASSOCIATES
briefDescription: Established in 2000, Entrepreneurs Associates (EA) is an organisation working in the volatile North Eastern Region of India, dedicated to enhance the lives of people, mediating through passionate commitment to nurture the entrepreneurial aspirations of individuals and communities. For nearly two decades, the organisation has been stirring societal mind-sets through advocacy, imparting trainings, and providing finance even to those considered technically un-bankable. Following key strategies of motivating, training, and mentorship, EA aspires to create meaningful impact.
